title: User login success with valid credentials
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in using valid username/email and password credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input valid username/email and password
Click the login button
User is successfully authenticated and redirected to tenant-specific dashboard

title: User login fail with invalid credentials
description: Verify that login attempt fails with invalid username/email or password and appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input invalid username/email or password
Click the login button
Login fails with 401 Unauthorized error and appropriate error message

title: Multi-tenant data isolation middleware enforcement
description: Verify that tenant middleware enforces data isolation and filters database queries by tenant_id for all endpoints.

steps.description: Send API request with a valid user token to access product data
Returned product data is filtered only for the user's tenant_id
Send API request for data from a different tenant_id with valid token
Request is denied or returns no data

title: Access API endpoint with missing token should fail
description: Verify that API endpoints secured by authentication middleware respond with 401 error when token is missing.

steps.description: Send API request without authentication token
Response returns 401 Unauthorized status

title: Super Admin tenant lifecycle management
description: Verify that Super Admin can create, update, and delete tenants with proper permission checks and data validation.

steps.description: Login as Super Admin
Create a new tenant with valid data
Tenant is created successfully and persisted in system
Update tenant details with valid changes
Tenant details are updated accordingly
Delete an existing tenant
Tenant and related data removed securely

title: Super Admin impersonation header validation
description: Verify that Super Admin impersonation via X-Tenant-ID header is strictly validated to prevent unauthorized cross-tenant access.

steps.description: Login as Super Admin
Send API request with X-Tenant-ID header to impersonate a tenant
Request is authorized only if Super Admin permissions validated and tenant ID is allowed
Send API request as tenant user with X-Tenant-ID header attempting impersonation
Request is rejected with 401 Unauthorized or forbidden error

title: CRUD operations for Products
description: Verify create, read, update, and delete operations for Products function correctly respecting tenant boundaries.

steps.description: Create a product with valid details under the logged-in tenant
Product is created and assigned to the tenant
List products and verify created product appears
Product list contains products only from authenticated tenant
Update product details
Product details are updated correctly
Delete product
Product is removed from tenant's product list

title: Sales order transactions CRUD and data reflection
description: Verify sales order creation, updates, and deletions reflect properly in sales data and dashboard statistics with tenant scoping.

steps.description: Create a sales order with valid data referencing existing products
Sales order is created and linked to tenant and products
Update sales order details
Updates reflected in sales order and dashboard sales summaries
Delete sales order
Sales order removed and dashboard updates accordingly

title: Stock quantity synchronization with sales and outbound
description: Verify stock quantities are updated transactionally and accurately when sales and outbound shipments are processed.

steps.description: Create stock record with initial quantity
Create sales order reducing stock
Stock quantity decreases accordingly, transactional update applied
Process outbound shipment moving stock through PENDING to SHIPPED status
Stock is decremented and consistent through shipment lifecycle

title: Outbound shipment status workflow sequence
description: Verify that outbound shipment statuses can only transition sequentially in the order: PENDING -> PICKING -> PACKING -> SHIPPED.

steps.description: Create an outbound shipment with initial status PENDING
Attempt to transition direct from PENDING to PACKING
Transition is rejected with an error due to invalid status flow
Transition PENDING -> PICKING -> PACKING -> SHIPPED sequentially
All status transitions succeed correctly in order

title: Dashboard data aggregation accuracy
description: Verify the dashboard correctly aggregates and displays sales statistics, stock levels, and other operational insights per tenant.

steps.description: Login as tenant user
Access the dashboard page
Dashboard displays correct sales statistics and stock counts corresponding only to the tenant data
Create and update sales and stock data
Dashboard reflects real-time changes correctly

title: Settings management persistence per tenant
description: Verify settings changes made by tenant users are persisted and isolated, and reflected after reload.

steps.description: Login as tenant user
Navigate to settings management page
Modify configurable settings
Settings are saved successfully and persist after page reload
Settings changes are scoped to tenant and do not affect other tenants

title: Subscription billing and plan management flow
description: Verify subscription endpoints allow plan upgrades, downgrades, billing info update, and reflect changes correctly.

steps.description: Login as tenant admin
Access subscription management UI or API
Perform subscription plan upgrade or downgrade
Plan changes are accepted and billing updated accordingly
Update subscription payment details
Payment details updated and validated

title: Data import functionality with tenant isolation
description: Verify that bulk data imports are processed correctly and only affect data within the authorized tenant's scope.

steps.description: Login as tenant admin
Upload valid bulk import data file
Data import process completes successfully
Imported data is associated only with tenant and visible only within tenant context

title: Data export functionality with tenant data only
description: Verify that data exported includes only tenant-specific data and export formats conform to expected structure.

steps.description: Login as tenant user
Request data export for products or sales
Export completes successfully with data scoped to tenant
Export data format matches expected schema and contains no cross-tenant information

title: Routing conflicts avoidance for frontend login and static assets
description: Verify routing configuration prevents conflicts between frontend login page and static assets serving and handles unknown routes gracefully.

steps.description: Access frontend login page URL
Login page loads correctly without resource conflicts
Request static assets like app.js or CSS files
Static assets load without route conflicts
Request invalid or unknown route
Responds with appropriate 404 or error page

title: Large app.js file performance and modular loading audit
description: Verify large JavaScript files such as app.js load efficiently without client-side errors and support modular loading to improve performance.

steps.description: Access frontend page loading app.js
app.js loads completely without client side errors or timeouts
App uses modular scripts to optimize loading time and memory usage

title: Database migration and synchronization correctness
description: Verify all database migrations are applied fully and legacy data is mapped correctly with tenant IDs associated.

steps.description: Run all migration scripts on test database
Migrations apply without errors and schema is up to date
Verify legacy data has correct tenant_id mappings
All legacy data queries respect tenant isolation and integrity

title: Environment variables and secrets configuration validation
description: Verify environment variables and secret keys are correctly set in both local (.env) and cloud (wrangler.jsonc) for secure and consistent operation.

steps.description: Check local development environment variables file for required entries
Required environment variables and secrets exist with valid values
Check cloud deployment configuration in wrangler.jsonc
Secrets and environment variables set correctly and accessed by runtime without errors

title: Unauthorized access attempt returns 401 error
description: Verify that unauthorized or invalid token attempts accessing protected routes return 401 Unauthorized errors consistently.

steps.description: Send API requests with invalid token
Endpoints return 401 Unauthorized
Send API requests without token
Endpoints return 401 Unauthorized
